name: ColdFusion: Avoid Queries with COUNT(*) statement
description: This metric retrieves the artifacts containing queries using the "SELECT *" statement.
output: This report lists all "SELECT *" queries. It provides the following information: CFQueries full name
rationale: A query that retrieves all columns of a table with a SELECT * can potentially be the source of important performance problems: Such performance problems may arise when the execution of the query returns a large result sets (many row with all the columns may then become a huge amount of data to transport over the network). Thus optimzer module can't provide a correct execution. Also, when using such queries, one cannot control how the columns will be ordered and returned to the client. This can lead to important data inconsistencies and thus stability issues.
remediation: Review the design of the query to select only useful Columns

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
